caption: By the poolside, a group of girls sat on beach chairs. A boy jumped from the diving board into the water, and another girl swam over to him. The boy stayed in one corner of the pool. There was a man on the shore talking to him. The boy went to a gate and found a garbage truck there with another boy. A father and son sat at a table, reading newspapers. They went to chase after a little dog. The boy brought something over to the dog. A family sat at a table to eat, and the boy went outside to meet his friends. He returned to the poolside.
